reasoning: CIN 3 (cervical intraepithelial neoplasia grade 3) is a high-grade precancerous cervical lesion. Incidence approximately 12-15 per 100k women globally, varies significantly by region (higher in developing countries, lower in screened populations). Based on WHO estimates and cervical cancer screening data.
source: Arbyn M et al. (2011). Estimates of incidence and mortality of cervical cancer in 2008: a systematic review. Lancet Oncol. 12(9):900-908
